Name: Starship Theory
About the game: Starship Theory is a ship building survival game. You begin with 4 survivors lost in unknown space. I'M GIVIN' HER ALL SHE'S GOT, CAPTAIN! Build a starship your own way. Plan the layout. Construct upgrades. Research new technology. Maintain complex components. Vent oxygen to extinguish fires. MAKE IT SO Break apart and mine asteroids. Trade with neutral ships you encounter. Threaten and bribe opponents. Salvage minerals from wrecked ships. LIVE LONG AND PROSPER Train your crew in agility, endurance, intelligence, engineering and combat. Keep them fed, rested and happy so they perform at their best. Make sure the ship is clean and topped up with oxygen. RESISTANCE IS FUTILE Engage hostile targets by targeting specific components. Unlock new weapons. Manage heat levels. Avoid collisions with asteroids. Endure heat from passing by a star. Engage the warp jump to escape disaster.
